attributes.action: Increase funding and government support for antibiotic development
attributes.additional_details:
Ian Gould
Ecological and clinical implications of antibiotic resistance 
World Extreme Medicine Expo 2015
London
attributes.background: Bacteria is becoming resistant to antibiotics. One day we will no longer be able to treat even simple infections and many people will die.We need new antibiotics yet practically none are being developed. This petition is for the government to take greater action and responsibility on this issue
